instructions: Sheet for the Imperium Maledictum RPG.  Includes Character, Combat, and Patron pages.  You can roll Characteristics and Skills by pressing the labels.  You can roll Specialisations, Weapons, and Psychic Powers by pressing the [*] button beside the name.  Rolls include advantage, superiority, difficulty, plus an extra modifier if needed.  You can contact Craig G if you have any questions.  Enjoy.
